page.title: 17MY KIND OF MUSIC
page.content: EVERY WEEK ON TELEVISION THERE IS A PROGRAMME CALLED "TOP OF THE POPS". ON THIS PROGRAMME YOU CAN SEE AND HEAR THE ARTISTS AND GROUPS WHO HAVE SOLD THOUSANDS OF RECORDS. EACH WEEK A CHART IS PUBLISHED TO SHOW WHO HAS SOLD THE MOST RECORDS. MY FAVOURITE GROUP ARE CALLED "DURAN DURAN" AND THEY ARE ALWAYS AT THE TOP OF THE HIT PARADE BECAUSE THEY SELL A LOT OF RECORDS. MY SISTER LIKES A GROUP CALLED "WHAM!" AND WE OFTEN ARGUE ABOUT WHICH IS THE BEST GROUP. AT HOME, WHEN WE PLAY OUR RECORDS MY DAD COMPLAINS ABOUT THE NOISE AND HE SAYS THAT THE MUSIC HE LISTENED TO WHEN HE WAS YOUNG SWAS BETTER THAN THE MUSIC WE HAVE TODAY. MY MUM SAYS IT IS'NT BETTER OR WORSE JUST DIFFERENT.
